海産: (かいさん) - marine product; marine (e.g. product, animal etc.)
海産巻き貝: (かいさんまきがい) - sea snail
海産巻貝: (かいさんまきがい) - sea snail
海産業: (かいさんぎょう) - marine industries; maritime industry
海盤車: (ヒトデ) - starfish/sea star/asteroid/any echinoderm of the class Asteroidea; northern Pacific seastar (Asterias amurensis)
海砂: (かいさ) - sea sand (sand collected from the ocean floor, as opposed to that which is used as an ingredient in concrete)
海神: (わだつみ) - sea god; Poseidon; Neptune
海神祭: (うんじゃみまつり) - Okinawan festival held in the honour of the sea gods (honor)
海禁: (かいきん) - ban on maritime activities during China's Ming and Qing dynasties
海笋貝: (ウミタケガイ) - dilate piddock (Barnea dilatata)
海筍貝: (ウミタケガイ) - dilate piddock (Barnea dilatata)
海綿体: (かいめんたい) - body of (genital) erectile tissue (incl. corpus cavernosum and corpus spongiosum)
海綿状: (かいめんじょう) - spongiform; spongelike; spongy
海綿状組織: (かいめんじょうそしき) - spongy tissue
海緑: (ウミミドリ) - pink sea milkwort (Glaux maritima var. obtusifolia)
海老で鯛を釣る: (えびでたいをつる) - to throw in a shrimp and pull out a whale; to use a sprat to catch a mackerel
海老チリ: (エビチリ) - (abbr. of 海老のチリソース煮) stir-fried shrimp in chili sauce
海老反り: (えびぞり) - holding out one or both hands and arching one's body backward like a shrimp (in kabuki, represents being overwhelmed by someone's power)
海老尾: (かいろうび) - (えびお only) goldfish with a shrimp-like tail; head of a shamisen or lute (bent back like a shrimp's tail)
海老殻苺: (エビガライチゴ) - Japanese wineberry (Rubus phoenicolasius); wine raspberry; wineberry
海老腰: (えびごし) - being bent (with age); being stooped over
海老蟹: (エビガニ) - crayfish (esp. red swamp crayfish, Procambarus clarkii)
海老責め: (えびぜめ) - Japanese bondage torture (bound victim sits cross-legged with their arms tied behind them, and the rope is tightened until their ankles touch their neck)
海胆: (ウニ) - sea urchin; sea urchin eggs
海苔: (のり) - nori (edible seaweed, esp. species Porphyra tenera and others of genus Porphyra, usu. dried and pressed into sheets); laver
海苔巻: (のりまき) - vinegared rice rolled in nori (laver)
海苔巻き: (のりまき) - vinegared rice rolled in nori (laver)
海茸: (ウミタケ) - Barnea dilatata (species of piddock)
海茸貝: (ウミタケガイ) - dilate piddock (Barnea dilatata)
海葱: (うみねぎ) - white squill (Urginea maritima); sea onion
海藻類: (かいそうるい) - seaweed; sea vegetable
海蘊: (モズク) - mozuku (Cladosiphon okamuranus and Sphaerotrichia divaricata, types of edible seaweed)
海蘭: (ウンラン) - Linaria japonica (species of toadflax)
海蛇: (ウミヘビ) - sea snake; worm eel (Ophichthidae spp.)/snake eel
海蛇座: (うみへびざ) - {astron} Hydra (constellation); the Sea Serpent
海蛍: (ウミホタル) - sea firefly (Vargula hilgendorfii); seed shrimp
海蜘蛛類: (うみぐもるい) - sea spiders (Pycnogonida spp.)
海螺: (ツブ) - (つぶ, ツブ only)  whelk (esp. Neptunea and Buccinum spp.); small spiral-shelled snail (esp. a pond snail)
海豚: (イルカ) - dolphin (or other small toothed whales, such as porpoises, belugas, etc.)
海象: (セイウチ) - walrus (Odobenus rosmarus) (rus: sivuch); (かいぞう only)  elephant seal (Mirounga spp.)
海豹: (アザラシ) - true seal (animal); earless seal
海賊の髑髏: (かいぞくのどくろ) - skull and crossbones (pirate flag); Jolly Roger
海賊放送: (かいぞくほうそう) - pirate radio
海賊版: (かいぞくばん) - pirated edition; bootleg
海賊版ソフトウェア: (かいぞくはんソフトウェア) - piracy; pirated software
海軍中将: (かいぐんちゅうじょう) - vice-admiral
海軍兵学校: (かいぐんへいがっこう) - naval academy
海軍大臣: (かいぐんだいじん) - Minister of the Navy
海軍将官: (かいぐんしょうかん) - admiral; flag officer
海軍工廠: (かいぐんこうしょう) - naval arsenal; naval shipyard
海軍特殊部隊: (かいぐんとくしゅぶたい) - SEAL (US)
海軍省: (かいぐんしょう) - Department of the Navy
海辺: (かいへん) - beach; seashore; seaside; coast
海遊び: (うみあそび) - playing in the sea
海運同盟: (かいうんどうめい) - shipping conference
